tasks.task_description: Create HTML structure with Tailwind CSS for modern UI
Implement camera access and video stream setup
Create smart detection system (motion detection, quality filtering)
Set up AWS Rekognition Custom Labels integration
Implement AR.js for button overlay when logo detected
Add image border marking when logo is identified
Create JavaScript modules for each component
Add error handling and user feedback

description: Create AR logo detection web application with camera access, smart detection, AWS Rekognition integration, and AR.js overlay
context: Created main HTML structure with Tailwind CSS, AR.js integration, and modern minimalistic design. Includes camera container, detection overlay, AR scene, and control panels.
Created configuration file with AWS settings and camera module for video stream management with error handling and status updates.
Created smart detection system with motion detection and quality filtering to optimize API calls, and AWS Rekognition Custom Labels integration with caching and error handling.
Created AR overlay module for button display and border marking with animations, and main application controller that orchestrates all components with detection loop and performance monitoring.
Created AR overlay module for button display and border marking with animations, and main application controller that orchestrates all components with detection loop and performance monitoring.
